definition: to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
ridge between fields/row of crops/grave mound/old variant of 壟|垄
bamboo conduit/wooden peg/spout/same as 筧|笕
earth embankment used to hold back or retain water/dike around a paddy field
pool/pond/bank of a pond/mountain slope/Taiwan pr. [pi2]
the Hong family (household)/Hung Gar Kung Fu - Martial Art
farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
Tung Tau Tseun village, Hong Kong Island
